Class Assets

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.superduckinvaders.game.assets.Assets

  • public class Assets
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for loading game assets.

      • loadAnimation

        public static com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation loadAnimation(java.lang.String file,
                                                                    int count,
                                                                    int frameWidth,
                                                                    float frameDuration)
        Loads the animation from the specified file.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to load from
        count - how many frames are in the file
        frameWidth - how wide each frame is in the file
        frameDuration - how long each frame should be shown for in seconds
        Returns:
        the animation

      • loadFont

        public static com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.BitmapFont loadFont(java.lang.String fontFile,
                                                                java.lang.String imageFile)
        Loads the bitmap font from the specified files.
        Parameters:
        fontFile - the file containing information about the glyphs stored on the image file
        imageFile - the file containing the actual glyphs
        Returns:
        the bitmap font
